section.title: We need your feedback!
section.para: If you found any typos in this manual or can think of any ways in which it could be improved, we would love to hear your suggestions. Please write to us at info@eneotecnolog√≠a.com with any clarifications you would like to send us.

If you have any recommendations about how these documents could be improved, try to be as specific as possible when describing your suggestion. If you discovered an error, please include the section number and the text surrounding the error so it will be easier for us to find it.
